answers.answer: That's odd. Everything you described sounds like symptoms of preeclampsia. Your doctor really should have ran more tests on you. It might be worth the trip to go to the e.r.
That's signs of preeclampsia. Your doctor should be running more tests! :/

I know im really starting to worry especially because I hadn't experienced this before my husband takes everything on a more calm side like dont worry its nothing bad and im like all frustrated hes very calm about it I'm considering leaving asap with my family since they live in the city where the hospital is at
Im a ftm so I wasn't too sure what it can be since I get nervous for everything :( especially now that I have only 43days to go
Get a second opinion. At 34 weeks I had to change drs bc I found out mine had mismanaged my whole pregnancy when I was dealing with what you are.
@allehkitteh What did ur second doctor tell you?

question: So everything had been going very good during my whole pregnancy until a month ago my wrists started getting a bit swollen and hurting alot my doctor told me it was more than likely I had carpal tunnel then just a few days ago I started getting really dizzy it hadn't happened before not even at the beginning of pregnancy then Saturday after I had gone to sleep I kept waking up because my baby was moving alot as soon as I got up I went to throw up and my face started to swell sooo much and I started to shiver so yesterday I had a prenatal follow up and let my doctor know what had happened because I was concerned she just said to drink more water but I'm still not at ease I'm getting worried since we live 3hours away from the hospital
title: have any of you ladies expirienced this???
